page.title: 19** Contributors **
page.content:
Pupils and staff from the following schools were involved in his survey:
{Ellacombe Primary {Shiphay Primary {Upton St.James Primary {Torquay Boys' Grammar
Our special thanks to the pupils concerned who did most of the foot slogging and the writing. So many were involved that it is impossible to mention all by name. The teachers did a great job overseeing the whole thing and quite enjoyed themselves as well.
Mrs.Bliss,Mr.Clare,Mr.Cooper,Mr.Haynes Mr.Palmer,Mr.Vernal, Mrs.White { {Compiled and edited by Stephen J Clare {** c. 19th July 1985 **
